verses.roman:
eta kahi' mahāprabhu madhyāhne calilā
rūpa-gosāñi mane kichu vismaya ha-ilā

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; madhya-ahne calilā—left to execute noon duties; rūpa-gosāñi—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; mane—in mind; kichu—some; vismaya ha-ilā—there was surprise.
translation: After saying this, Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to perform His noontime duties, leaving Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī somewhat surprised.
